text: Artigas Barrios (7 July 1937 - 16 June 2022) was an Uruguayan politician. He was born in Lascano, Uruguay. He was a member of the National Front Party. Barrios was a member of the Chamber of Representatives from 2000 until 2005. He also was an Intendant of Rocha Department from 2005 until 2015. Barrios died on 16 June 2022 in Montevideo, Uruguay from pneumonia, aged 84Falleci√≥ el exintendente de Rocha por el Frente Amplio Artigas Barrios ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Uruguayan politicians
title: Artigas Barrios
